website_summaries.verdict: A family favorite at a low price. You get a lot of granola bars without spending a lot of money.
pros: A top-selling, trusted brand at a low price
Bars contain whole grains and no high-fructose corn syrup

customer_reviews.title: Wierd flavor and smell from most recent batch of granola bars.
customer_reviews.text: Recent deliveries of these granola bars are odd smelling and tasting. Feels like they were not stored properly, as the wrappers are a little warped and seem melted or something. Previous delivery of granola bars were good, but this one is hard to eat. I am sure the preservatives likely make them ok to eat, but not enjoying them like usual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WHERES MY CHOCOLATE CHUNK
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 boxes for snacks to have at work. Advertised at 18 bars (says so on box!) 6 dark chocolate chunk, 6 peanut butter chocolate chip, 6 s'mores. Lol......there were NO chocolate chunk!!!! Who does that?? Who takes time to write reviews like this? Wassup with my missing chocolate chunk bars? C'mon maaaaaaaaaaan
customer_reviews.author: david malec

customer_reviews.title: arrived nearly melted
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to be able to give them each day to my older 3 kids for their lunches for the park program they go to. But, I opened the box to find most were half melted with the chips they have in them and were super soft. I get that it's hot out but it's pretty useless for us now.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Stale.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened these I could smell a stale smell. I tasted the bars and my smeller was correct. Very stale tasting. So then I looked at the date and it expires in 2 months. I'm so disappointed. Do not buy these if you want fresh bars.
customer_reviews.author: JDDaley

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. Great value for the price. I just wasn't a fan of the flavor overall. They were too soft and too sweet. Something about the consistency just didn't do it for me.
customer_reviews.author: N. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: my weakness
customer_reviews.text: I got, to be honest, I ate the whole box in one day and if that means I have an addiction to these then call ema an addict.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Granola Bars!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a snack for my children and they definitely approved of them. I have also tried them myself and if you like granola bard you would also like these! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Small, Not Filling, and sugary
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying nature valley for a while, and when I got these I was pretty disappointed. I guess I just didn't process how small, sugary, and un-filling they were by comparison. They are more candy than granola bar (as I now understand granola bar). They have a nostalgic place in my heart, and they taste good - but it would take the whole box to satiate your hunger. I won't buy again - although for the price it was an okay deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this particular box of granola bars for the taste and freshness. I like that it has a variety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These aren't the chewy granola bars of my childhood.
customer_reviews.text: These aren't the chewy granola bars of my childhood. They are mostly air and crumble as bad as nature valley bars.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket Pak

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the many snacks I will be continuing to order off of Amazon. Great price and tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: okay, not best taste
customer_reviews.text: really good. Box was kinda squished but still good for the kiddos. Not my taste, but they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Summers

customer_reviews.title: Gross!
customer_reviews.text: GROSS DO NOT BUY, THIS IS HORRIBLE TASTING WITHOUT THE REGULAR AMOUNT OF SUGAR IN IT!
customer_reviews.author: Jgardner

customer_reviews.title: Quaker Chewy Granola Bars Variety Pack great snack for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Quaker Chewy Granola Bars, Variety Pack has something for everyone. They are the perfect snack.
customer_reviews.author: blilly

customer_reviews.title: I ate so many...
customer_reviews.text: I ate so many I never want to eat another granola bar again. These are so cute and such a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Lynde

customer_reviews.title: Buy on sale
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I only buy them when they drop on sale as they are a bit pricey, but they taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: "CHEWY GRANOLA BARS"
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these bars!! They and nice and chewy (unlike the ones that are hard as a rock and over 150 calories). Since they are chewy, and not rock hard, they crumble nicely for putting in yogurt or milk. I like eat this granola bars in the early morning whit a glass of milk, before play basketball. All the flavors taste great, The only issue I wish the bars were slightly larger, GOOD product from Quaker the Brand all life,
customer_reviews.author: HAROLD

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. Great snack for school. Tasty and heathier than candy
customer_reviews.author: Wianca

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very THIN! Bad quality, they were very crumbly. Seemed old.
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value but for the stale bars
customer_reviews.text: All the bars were stale tasting. Big disappointment except for the wild critters outside.
customer_reviews.author: Buckie

customer_reviews.title: and it tastes just as good. You feel a little bit better with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sure, it's not the healthiest option. But most people who buy these (or Kudos) do it for the flavor. It's certainly got more nutrients than a typical candy bar, and it tastes just as good. You feel a little bit better with the grains and fiber as well, so that's definitely a plus. I grew up with these being an occasional treat, and I still love them as an adult.
customer_reviews.author: PETER Y.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I expected It’s a bit sweet apart from that it’s delicious
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy bars!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Quaker Chewy Granola bars. I buy this for my son to take as a snack in the car for road trips. Also, my husband even sneaks them in his lunch for work sometimes. These taste great and are a great 'dessert' option for kids lunches, when they don't really need candy or cookies. I haven't met a kid who hasn't liked them yet!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Always taste great! Love the convenience of having it delivered to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious But Watch Expiration Date
customer_reviews.text: These are very delicious. My daughter and I use them for a snack at church. My only issue with them was that we received some very near their expiration date. Since we only eat 2 a week, it takes us awhile to go through them. If you're planning to eat them soon, no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: my family loves it & I dont mind since its a quick healthy snack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: liked the smores.
customer_reviews.text: The bars were fresh, I liked ths smores the best. The peanut butter was ok. I didnt like the choc chip. That bar has a more coarse oat texture then the others. I think those bars they shouldve ground the oats a bit.
customer_reviews.author: IdolFan

customer_reviews.title: When I opened up the box after shipping, the ...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened up the box after shipping, the bars were very soft and did not hold together well. I'm assuming the truck that they were delivered in was warm causing the fires to not keep their usual shape consistency.
customer_reviews.author: SummerLoving

customer_reviews.title: A little sweet but good with coffee
customer_reviews.text: Good bars. A little bit on the sweet side but great with coffee in the morning. I usually have one or two with some espresso in the morning to hold me until lunch. they're pretty small bars by the way.
customer_reviews.author: thaiguy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bulk buy for savings
customer_reviews.text: Nice to get these in bulk at Amazon. The bars are just as described online and taste just like the bars do that I buy at our grocery store (except the price is considerably less :)) Thanks, Quaker!
customer_reviews.author: LindyLouTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: crushed!
customer_reviews.text: Box had been retaped up and granola bars were on the bottom of a case of Gatorade-SQUASHED!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Kehler

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied! :)
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy! love these variety packs. Everything was great and fresh, the expiration dates are good. A really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Good granola bars
customer_reviews.text: Good granola bars, for the money. They are great portions for a small snack, and better for you then candy bars, cookies, or cake.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Eggemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Always delivered on time. Tasty, although not as ...
customer_reviews.text: Always delivered on time. Tasty, although not as healthy as one would think. They are simply candy bars made with cheaper grain ingredients. So be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. Ritchey

customer_reviews.title: Great variety pack of granola bars
customer_reviews.text: Great variety pack of granola bars. Good for holding you over until the next meal and they taste pretty good. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: JessnPhil

customer_reviews.title: yummy
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these in the morning or when we are in a hurry. Everything came well packed and in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Good variety pack
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety pack to try. A bit on the sweet side but the size of the bar is just right so you won't feel sick of eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special, I was using them during mid morning and hour before going home to keep the hunger down..
customer_reviews.author: Adam C Skerven

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and convenient snack when on the go.
customer_reviews.text: These are rather tasty granola bars and have a noticeably different (better) texture than others in the segment.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Good, but compare with store.
customer_reviews.text: Very good but not sure whether I'd buy again. Also, such products tend not to be as fresh as from store.
customer_reviews.author: Jay H. Colborn

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it, especially for $4
customer_reviews.text: Even though the box came a little beat up, the product still came fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them and so do the kids. Great snack size and flavorful - does not taste like cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Stallings

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as what I had before. I don't like it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Can

customer_reviews.title: Guilt Free quick snack
customer_reviews.text: Easy to grab and go. Everyone loves the taste and I don't feel guilty about snacking. The Smores are a little too crumbly.
customer_reviews.author: Kayti Mangan

customer_reviews.title: Snack now and later
customer_reviews.text: Nice and chewy, with a little crunch. great snacks for those times when you need it
customer_reviews.author: CJ Beck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great combination of some of my kids' favorite flavors. Fresh and flavorful!
customer_reviews.author: Mom by Love

customer_reviews.title: Great $$$ for the QTY
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to put inside the "recovery kit" for my wedding. Great price for the qty.
customer_reviews.author: cindy m.

customer_reviews.title: It's a granola bar
customer_reviews.text: Same Quaker quality that you would expect good granola bars packaged and arrived well
customer_reviews.author: Multitasker

customer_reviews.title: Thin and not so filling...good for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the price I paid. Would be good for lunchs and treats.
customer_reviews.author: A Kindle User

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and great price! My kids love these over all the other granola bars.
customer_reviews.author: SRIA

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The granola was a little hard and smaller than the past.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie P

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact I can buy more granola bars online than could buy at a grocery store
customer_reviews.author: Kelly metz

customer_reviews.title: Seemed Stale...
customer_reviews.text: These really did not taste very great....they were mushy and fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: yummy!
customer_reviews.text: shipped these down to Disney world ... they held us over in the mornings and made a great snack at the parks!
customer_reviews.author: REO84

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delicious assortment and a perfect snack for when driving or as a filling breakfast bar
customer_reviews.author: Emily L. Park

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not the healthiest. Product contained marshmellow(gelatin) for those who avoid pork.
customer_reviews.author: Queens Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can use the bathroom like a normal person and I feel really good.
customer_reviews.author: SRMel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great snack for the price. Buy in bulk to really see the savings!
customer_reviews.author: yodandy

customer_reviews.title: not chewy and sweet like I remember
customer_reviews.text: dry, flat and crumbly, not chewy and sweet like I remember. Won't be buying Quaker bars anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna L.

customer_reviews.title: Good snack and substitute for something unhealthy like chips
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely buy again and overall is the same as what you would get at a store.....but cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy.G

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet and small bars... taste good though if you like the sweetness
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for taste if you like sweet stuff. But while these granola bars are probably healthier than your typical candy bar, it just packs in too much sugar. Plus, the bar size is rather small at not even 1 ounce per bar. Overall 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lantana Al

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love Them
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these granola bars so I stock up!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good value compared to the store!
customer_reviews.text: Good value compared to the store without using copious coupons and hunting. Also I prefer this variety pack.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Bleck
customer_reviews.text: Stale. Stale. Stale. Mushy and falling apart. Old. only the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: too much like a weird rice crispy treat - not saying they ...
customer_reviews.text: Not for me, too much like a weird rice crispy treat - not saying they are not good, most people seem to like them, just not my taste.
customer_reviews.author: AJ in MS

customer_reviews.title: BEST BAR BY FAR
customer_reviews.text: I'm an empty nester but my children grew up eating these as a snack! The product is always affordable,tastes great and I purchased the variety packs when available so each child got to choose his or her favorite flavor. Nowadays with kids out of college and spending less (just a little) less on groceries,my husband decided to drop a few pounds. He really likes these bars as much as our children did! So I'm STILL buying Quaker granola bars after 40 years? I decided to try one and now I must keep up with our inventory,being out of them could cause a panic?!
customer_reviews.author: alive pearl

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly chewy
customer_reviews.text: These are not my favorite. They seem stale, (even though the date says otherwise). They crumble all over when you eat them. The quality just isn't there like before, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: Nice, just plz stop loading up, on flavors that are unpopular
customer_reviews.text: Nice. With bulk products though you ever notice you get to much of the unpopular , not so well liked flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: A bit on the small side for adults
customer_reviews.text: These taste good, but they are actually pretty small. I guess they would be great for kids lunches, but my 59 year old brother doesn't think one is enough. When he wants a snack, he wants a snack that is going to feel like he's eaten something. As a result, we are looking at larger options.
customer_reviews.author: The Lyttle Yellow House

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have on hand at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This variety is good. My grandsons love them for snacks and sometimes will take a couple if they are late getting out the door in the morning for school.
customer_reviews.author: Nana in Nebraska

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: chocolate and peanut butter are really good, but since they raised the price I didn't buy them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mai. A

customer_reviews.title: Bars
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and they tasted like I got them from the store
customer_reviews.author: Charlyce poindexter

customer_reviews.title: Great granola bars
customer_reviews.text: Great granola bars, our favorite brand. Was happy to be able to buy the variety pack to get all the types we like
customer_reviews.author: oneother

customer_reviews.title: Kid-Approved
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these and with the subscribe and save price, it's a bargain to get them from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: H. Norbury

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SNACK
customer_reviews.text: i live for quaker brand chewy granola bars and i would gladly die for them if necessary. if i was stranded on a desert island i would be very glad if i had these quaker brand chewy granola bars to accompany me and with 18 of them i would probably survive for a week or three. i love you
customer_reviews.author: Amy K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the quantity you get. Love all the flavors and so does my family!!
customer_reviews.author: mmmichelle

product_meta.title: Quaker Chewy Granola Bars, Variety Pack, 18 Count
product_meta.description: Size:18 Count (Pack of 1)Variety is the spice of life, and now your family can choose from a variety of Quaker chewy granola bars. With family favorite flavors like chocolate chip, peanut butter chocolate chip, s’mores, and oatmeal raisin chewy granola bars in each box, and 8 gram of whole grains in each bar, your family has tasty choices to help keep them going.
feature_bullets: Variety pack includes: low fat chocolate chunk, peanut butter chocolate chip, and s’ mores
8 gram of whole grains in each bar
Made with whole grain Quaker oats
